entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is described as a student taking an examination in Defense Against the Dark Arts. His hair is lank and greasy, and he has a hooked nose. He is scribbling on parchment with his hand flying across the paper.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as moving around behind Snape to read the heading of the examination paper. He is around the same age as Snape and sees that Snape's writing is minuscule and cramped.

relationships.description: Snape and Harry are around the same age, with Snape being 15 or 16 years old.
Professor Flitwick is walking past a boy (Snape) with untidy black hair.
